I'm known by my primary Steam account here: https://steamcommunity.com/id/MoeJama/. I own this game in my alternate account, the one I'm using to write this review.

This is a PERFECT continuation of Half-Life 2. The escape from City 17 was very thrilling and exciting for me; with more aliens and Civil Protection officers to shoot down in a city that crumbles before your eyes, the experience gets wild and fun. The game's physics, mechanics, and graphics are great, and such surely contributed to the Episode 1 experience. And this game yet again got me hooked into playing through more of the HL series, which is, in my eyes, an essential thing that comes out of playing highly-acclaimed video game series.

Great job with this game, Mr. Newell -- and the rest of the Steam Team, of course. You guys never stop making great games for your community, and that is something that you all should be proud of individually. Thank you, Valve, you have all my love and support!
This feels more like a roller-coaster ride than an amusement park that we usually feel in Half-Life games. But it is still super fun and worth playing due to the interesting premise.
Very good, think of it as an expansion for the story, would recommend buying episode 2 as well since this ends on a cliffhanger

This somehow managed to be one of the best, and also the most forgettable of the HL2 series, which is kinda crazy. I could tell it was all just setup for the second episode, but that was completely fine. Succinct, content/action packed, and kept tying up loose end after loose end. Nothing bad to say about it, but also nothing overwhelmingly good.

A meaningful continuation of the HL2 storyline and picks up the story right where it left off. Nothing groundbreaking is added, but the gameplay and mechanics of its predecessor more than carry it through its relatively short runtime.
8.5/10

Some games just don't need reviews, so don't waste your time reading them. Go for it!

Yes, play this too.  If you enjoyed Half-Life, this is a more puzzle heavy bite sized expansion.  It's about 3 hours long, it took me longer because I'm not good at puzzles AND I wanted to get that one achievement on my first try.  The one where you only use your gun once and stick with the gravity gun.  It made things so much harder.

Buy it.
Freeman leaves I think, also don't shoot more than 1 bullet. I've made that mistake, it's too late for me now..

Well if you liked half life 2 and want to experience more, this game shows what happens after Breen is defeated by you and Alyx Vance(A follower of you and a member of the rebellion). You two basically escape the remains of City 17 and evacuate anyone still left in City 17 before the core to the Citadel(A large structure where Wallace Breen and most of the combine army resided in City 17) blows up leaving nothing left of City 17.

Half-Life'ın bende ayrı bir yeri vardır ama bence serinin en eğlenceli ve sıkılmadan (özellikle oyunun sonu) oynayabileceğiniz oyunu budur.En güzel yanlarından birisi de oyun boyu Gravity Gun'a bağımlı olmamamız.Özellikle aksiyon sahneleri diğer oyunlarına kıyasla çok daha dolu.Fiyat olarakta çok uygun "Orange Box" indirimdeyken alırsanız çok makul fiyatlara hem Half-Life serisini,hemde Portal'ın birinci oyununu elde edebilirsiniz.Tek kötü yanı diğer oyunlarından daha kısa sürüyor (4 saat).
I don't know why, but once you played this game, you want to play it again sometime. I'm sure,  that means the game is perfect. Strongly recommended!

6/10.
